title: Structure-based superresolution
description: My PhD lab specialized in advanced image processing for single molecule applications in biology. as part of this effort,we participated in the International Single Molecule Mocroscopy challenge and won first place in several categories. I was able to make some interesting insights on using prior information about biological structures that allowed a 100% improvement on oir metrics.

title: InferAlpha - lending startup for Childrens books
description: Worked with Aarthi Ramasubramaniam as the technical cofounder on a Netflix-style book lending startup that specialized in Childrens books. We wrapped up operations in 2017.
